Title: AI for Mine Safety Monitoring
Abstract: Using artificial intelligence to monitor and predict safety hazards in coal mines to prevent accidents.

Title: Coal Quality Prediction Using Machine Learning
Abstract: Developing machine learning models to predict coal quality based on geological and chemical data.

Title: Automated Coal Washing Process Optimization
Abstract: Implementing automated control systems to optimize the coal washing and beneficiation process.

Title: Methane Gas Detection and Alert System
Abstract: Creating a real-time methane gas detection system with automated alerts for mine safety.

Title: Sustainable Rehabilitation of Mining Areas
Abstract: Developing sustainable methods for rehabilitating mining areas with native vegetation and soil restoration.
